QuestData.Title: Rulers of Dire Maul
QuestData.Description: Now that we've put the hurt on them at the ruins, it's time to attack the ogres in their own territory.$B$BThe Gordok are the "upper class" of the Gordunni clan, chosen to defend Dire Maul. They'll know we mean business once we start taking out their strongest members.$B$BNothing fancy here, $n. Just get out there and crack some Gordok skulls.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Gordok Enforcers and 6 Gordok Ogre-Mages.
QuestData.CompletionText: Make sure you're killing the Gordok guards, whelp! There's strategy behind this even if your peon brain can't understand it.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! Even these fools will soon know that to stand against the Horde means death.
